page.title: 12Ashcott - Past (continued)
page.content: The only reason to have a new school is the large number of children arriving from nearby villages where {schools}are closing rapidly.The 1st council houses were built 80 years ago.There has been a lot of building {development}during the last decade. Yet the old buildings remain and the new homes are well designed. {World War II:}The main disturbance in Ashcott was all the men having to fight.The area received very large numbers of{evacuees,}mostly from the cities.These evacuees found rural life very strange,one did not know what an egg was.One woman is still contacting her evacuees who live in Canada.A 500 lb bomb fell but sank into the soft ground.It has never been recovered. There was a fire control and spotlight unit in Ashcott.
